verses.verse: Now these <WH428> are the last <WH314> words <WH1697> of David. <WH1732> David <WH1732> the son <WH1121> of Jesse <WH3448> declares, <WH5002> And the man <WH1397> who was raised <WH6965> on high <WH5920> declares, <WH5002> The anointed <WH4899> of the God <WH430> of Jacob, <WH3290> And the sweet <WH9335> psalmist <WH2158> of Israel, <WH3478>
"The Spirit <WH7307> of the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> by me, And His word <WH4405> was on my tongue. <WH3956>

"The God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> said, <WH559> The Rock <WH6697> of Israel <WH3478> spoke <WH1696> to me, 'He who rules <WH4910> over men <WH120> righteously, <WH6662> Who rules <WH4910> in the fear <WH3374> of God, <WH430>

Is as the light <WH216> of the morning <WH1242> [when] the sun <WH8121> rises, <WH2224> A morning <WH1242> without <WH3808> clouds, <WH5645> [When] the tender <WH1877> grass <WH1877> [springs] out of the earth, <WH776> Through <WH4480> sunshine <WH5051> after <WH4480> rain. <WH4306>'

"Truly <WH3588> is not my house <WH1004> so <WH3651> with God <WH410>? For He has made <WH7760> an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> with me, Ordered <WH6186> in all <WH3605> things, <WH3605> and secured; <WH8104> For all <WH3605> my salvation <WH3468> and all <WH3605> [my] desire, <WH2656> Will He not indeed <WH3588> make [it] grow <WH6779>?
"But the worthless, <WH1100> every <WH3605> one <WH3605> of them will be thrust <WH5074> away <WH5074> like thorns, <WH6975> Because <WH3588> they cannot <WH3808> be taken <WH3947> in hand; <WH3027>

But the man <WH376> who touches <WH5060> them Must be armed <WH4390> with iron <WH1270> and the shaft <WH6086> of a spear, <WH2595> And they will be completely <WH8313> burned <WH8313> with fire <WH784> in [their] place. <WH7675>"

These <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of the mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> whom <WH834> David <WH1732> had: Josheb-basshebeth a Tahchemonite, <WH8461> chief <WH7218> of the captains, <WH7991> he was [called] Adino <WH5722> the Eznite, <WH6112> because <WH5921> of eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> slain <WH2491> [by him] at one <WH259> time; <WH6471>

and after <WH310> him was Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Dodo <WH1734> the Ahohite, <WH266> one of the three <WH7969> mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> with David <WH1732> when they defied <WH2778> the Philistines <WH6430> who were gathered <WH622> there <WH8033> to battle <WH4421> and the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> had withdrawn. <WH5927>

He arose <WH6965> and struck <WH5221> the Philistines <WH6430> until <WH5704> <WH3588> his hand <WH3027> was weary <WH3021> and clung <WH1692> to the sword, <WH2719> and the Lord <WH3068> brought <WH6213> about <WH6213> a great <WH1419> victory <WH8668> that day; <WH3117> and the people <WH5971> returned <WH7725> after <WH310> him only <WH389> to strip <WH6584> [the slain].

Now after <WH310> him was Shammah <WH8048> the son <WH1121> of Agee <WH89> a Hararite. <WH2043> And the Philistines <WH6430> were gathered <WH622> into a troop, <WH9131> where <WH8033> there <WH8033> was a plot <WH2513> of ground <WH7704> full <WH4392> of lentils, <WH5742> and the people <WH5971> fled <WH5127> from the Philistines. <WH6430>

But he took <WH3320> his stand <WH3320> in the midst <WH8432> of the plot, <WH2513> defended <WH5337> it and struck <WH5221> the Philistines; <WH6430> and the Lord <WH3068> brought <WH6213> about <WH6213> a great <WH1419> victory. <WH8668>

Then three <WH7969> of the thirty <WH7970> chief <WH7218> men <WH7218> went <WH3381> down <WH3381> and came <WH935> to David <WH1732> in the harvest <WH7105> time <WH7105> to the cave <WH4631> of Adullam, <WH5725> while the troop <WH9131> of the Philistines <WH6430> was camping <WH2583> in the valley <WH6010> of Rephaim. <WH7497>
And David <WH1732> was then <WH227> in the stronghold, <WH4686> while the garrison <WH4673> of the Philistines <WH6430> was then <WH227> in Bethlehem. <WH1035>

And David <WH1732> had <WH183> a craving <WH183> and said, <WH559> "Oh <WH4310> that someone <WH4310> would give <WH8248> me water <WH4325> to drink <WH8248> from the well <WH877> of Bethlehem <WH1035> which <WH834> is by the gate! <WH8179>"

So the three <WH7969> mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> broke <WH1234> through <WH1234> the camp <WH4264> of the Philistines, <WH6430> and drew <WH7579> water <WH4325> from the well <WH877> of Bethlehem <WH1035> which <WH834> was by the gate, <WH8179> and took <WH5375> [it] and brought <WH935> [it] to David. <WH1732> Nevertheless he would <WH14> not drink <WH8354> it, but poured <WH5258> it out to the Lord; <WH3068>

and he said, <WH559> "Be it far <WH2486> from me, O Lord, <WH3068> that I should do <WH6213> this. <WH2088> [Shall I drink <WH8354>] the blood <WH1818> of the men <WH376> who went <WH1980> in [jeopardy] of their lives <WH5315>?" Therefore he would <WH14> not drink it. These <WH428> things <WH428> the three <WH7969> mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> did. <WH6213>

And Abishai, <WH52> the brother <WH251> of Joab, <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah, <WH6870> was chief <WH7218> of the thirty. <WH7992> And he swung <WH5782> his spear <WH2595> against <WH5921> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and killed <WH2491> [them,] and had a name <WH8034> as well as the three. <WH7969>
He was most <WH4480> honored <WH3513> of the thirty, <WH7969> therefore he became <WH1961> their commander; <WH8269> however, he did not attain <WH935> to the three. <WH7969>

Then Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada, <WH3077> the son <WH1121> of a valiant <WH2428> man <WH376> of Kabzeel, <WH6909> who had done mighty <WH7227> deeds, <WH6467> killed <WH5221> the two <WH8147> [sons of] Ariel <WH739> of Moab. <WH4124> He also went <WH3381> down <WH3381> and killed <WH5221> a lion <WH9030> in the middle <WH8432> of a pit <WH877> on a snowy <WH7950> day. <WH3117>

And he killed <WH5221> an Egyptian, <WH4713> an impressive <WH4758> man. <WH376> Now the Egyptian <WH4713> [had] a spear <WH2595> in his hand, <WH3027> but he went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to him with a club <WH7626> and snatched <WH1497> the spear <WH2595> from the Egyptian's hand, <WH3027> and killed <WH2026> him with his own spear. <WH2595>
These <WH428> [things] Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada <WH3077> did, <WH6213> and had a name <WH8034> as well as the three <WH7969> mighty <WH1368> men. <WH1368>
He was honored <WH3513> among <WH4480> the thirty, <WH7970> but he did not attain <WH935> to the three. <WH7969> And David <WH1732> appointed <WH7760> him over <WH413> his guard. <WH4928>
Asahel <WH6214> the brother <WH251> of Joab <WH3097> was among the thirty; <WH7970> Elhanan <WH445> the son <WH1121> of Dodo <WH1734> of Bethlehem, <WH1035>
Shammah <WH8048> the Harodite, <WH2733> Elika <WH470> the Harodite, <WH2733>
Helez <WH2503> the Paltite, <WH6407> Ira <WH5896> the son <WH1121> of Ikkesh <WH6142> the Tekoite, <WH8621>
Abiezer <WH44> the Anathothite, <WH6069> Mebunnai <WH4012> the Hushathite, <WH2843>
Zalmon <WH9485> the Ahohite, <WH266> Maharai <WH4121> the Netophathite, <WH5200>
Heleb <WH2460> the son <WH1121> of Baanah <WH1196> the Netophathite, <WH5200> Ittai <WH863> the son <WH1121> of Ribai <WH7380> of Gibeah <WH1390> of the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin, <WH1144>
Benaiah <WH1141> a Pirathonite, <WH6553> Hiddai <WH1914> of the brooks <WH5158> of Gaash, <WH1608>
Abi-albon the Arbathite, <WH6164> Azmaveth <WH5820> the Barhumite, <WH978>
Eliahba <WH455> the Shaalbonite, <WH8170> the sons <WH1121> of Jashen, <WH3464> Jonathan, <WH3083>
Shammah <WH8048> the Hararite, <WH2043> Ahiam <WH279> the son <WH1121> of Sharar <WH8325> the Ararite, <WH2043>
Eliphelet <WH467> the son <WH1121> of Ahasbai, <WH308> the son <WH1121> of the Maacathite, <WH4602> Eliam <WH463> the son <WH1121> of Ahithophel <WH302> the Gilonite, <WH1526>
Hezro <WH2695> the Carmelite, Paarai <WH6474> the Arbite, <WH701>
Igal <WH3008> the son <WH1121> of Nathan <WH5416> of Zobah, <WH6678> Bani <WH1137> the Gadite, <WH1425>
Zelek <WH6768> the Ammonite, <WH5984> Naharai <WH5171> the Beerothite, <WH886> armor <WH3627> bearers <WH5375> of Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah, <WH6870>
Ira <WH5896> the Ithrite, <WH3505> Gareb <WH1619> the Ithrite, <WH3505>
Uriah <WH223> the Hittite; <WH2850> thirty-seven in all. <WH3605>
